body:
# Deprecation Notice

> [!NOTE]
> `DD_RUNTIME_ID_ENABLED` has been deprecated and will be removed in future releases. Please use `DD_RUNTIME_METRICS_RUNTIME_ID_ENABLED` instead.

# Components

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :bug: Add String length truncation limit to ObjectIntrospector and update truncation metrics (#8825 - @jandro996)
* :bug: Adapt standalone ASM to support API Security (#8804 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Add appsec.waf.input_truncated metric (#8791 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Extended appsec request body collection  (#8748 - @jandro996)
* :sparkles: Extended appsec request/response headers collection (#8724 - @jandro996)

## Build & Tooling

* :sparkles: Add artifacts to public s3 bucket (#8947 - @randomanderson)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :sparkles: Improve PR information building (#8908 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Truncate span stack traces when Test Optimization is enabled (#8903 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :bug: Ensure auto-detected service name is the same for every process in the same build (#8902 - @nikita-tkachenko-datadog)
* :bug: Use tag as fallback in api requests if no branch is available (#8876 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Add support for JUnit 5.13-RC1 (#8865, #8871 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Implement attempt to fix v3 and v4 and bump capability version (#8824 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :broom: Align retry logic for all test framework instrumentations (#8803 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :bug: Always build ci workspace without trailing separator (#8788 - @daniel-mohedano)
* :sparkles: Add commit discrepancies telemetry when building repository git information (#8763 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Data Streams Monitoring

* :bulb: Surface process tags in dsm payloads and use them for base hash calculation (#8836 - @amarziali)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :sparkles: Optimized allocations for collection filter functions (#8896 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix SymDB upload size check (#8887 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Add support for Set in filter function (#8873 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Add support for isDefined in log template (#8859 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix Max captured frames for Exception Replay (#8856 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Remove static inherited fields collection (#8832 - @jpbempel)
* :bulb: Add process tags to dynamic instrumentation intake payload (#8779 - @amarziali)

## GraalVM native-image

* :sparkles: Add support for GraalVM Native GC metrics (#8913 - @ygree)
* :sparkles: Add JMXFetch support for GraalVM Native (#8569 - @ygree)

## JMX fetch

* :sparkles: Add support for GraalVM Native GC metrics (#8913 - @ygree)

## Library Injection

* :sparkles: Deny oracle db jvm based tools (#8909 - @bric3)

## OpenTracing

* :bug: Fix OT packaging for exception replay (#8912 - @jpbempel)

## Profiling

* :sparkles: Bump ddprof to 1.27.0 (#8893 - @jbachorik)
  * Properly handle the adaptive sampling interval overflow by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/213
  * Fix #200 Crash related to aligned_alloc and free in context by @yanglong1010 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/208
  * Explicitly initialize empty context page by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/210
  * Re-connect crash recursion protection with VM stackwalker by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/214
* :sparkles: Enable ZSTD compression for profiling (#8862 - @MattAlp)
* :sparkles: Extend JPS re-implementation to J9 family (#8813 - @MattAlp)
* :bulb: Collect process tags for profiling upload requests (#8780 - @amarziali)

## Telemetry

* :bulb: Surface process tags on telemetry payloads (#8837 - @amarziali)

## Trace context propagation

* :sparkles: Migrating all HttpClient Instrumentations to Inject Full Context (#8826 - @mhlidd)
* :sparkles: Migrating all HttpServer Instrumentations to Extract full Context (#8820 - @mhlidd)
* :sparkles: Add context API support OTel propagators (#8770 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Tracer core

* :sparkles::zap: Skip JAXB generated classes classloader (#9003 - @bric3)
* :sparkles: Add DD_RUNTIME_METRICS_RUNTIME_ID_ENABLED alias for runtime id generation (#8981 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Use resolved address for peer.hostname when available without hitting the cache (#8915 - @amarziali)
* :bulb: Surface server name process tag for tomcat (#8894 - @amarziali)
* :bulb: Surface websphere cell and server name on process tags (#8880 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Added special lightweight pre-main class that skips installation on incompatible JVMs. (#8855 - @AlexeyKuznetsov-DD)
* :bulb: Add entrypoint type to process tags (#8839 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Extend JPS re-implementation to J9 family (#8813 - @MattAlp)
* :sparkles: Notify listeners when the scope top changes after switching scope stacks (#8797 - @mcculls)
* :sparkles: Read hsperfdata for Java PIDs if jvmstat is unavailable (#8792 - @MattAlp)
* :bug: Turn JDK socket support on by default (#8752 - @sarahchen6)
* :sparkles: Simplify context propagation (#8719 - @PerfectSlayer)
* :sparkles: Add JSON parsing support (#8579 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Tracer internal logging

* :sparkles: Fix printing format of span identifiers (#8897 - @vandonr)

## Tracer public API

* :bulb: Track the source of installation (#8956 - @mabdinur)
* :sparkles: Enforce size limit on application_monitoring.yaml files (#8789 - @mtoffl01)
* :sparkles: Enabling baggage cache to support limits and non-ascii characters (#8713 - @mhlidd)

# Instrumentations

## AWS Lambda instrumentation

* :sparkles: Pass Lambda Request ID to Extension (#8814 - @nhulston)

## Core Java language instrumentation

* :sparkles: Ensure ClassloadingInstrumentation is always applied even with `DD_TRACE_ENABLED=false` (#8863 - @mcculls)

## Eclipse Vert.x instrumentation

* :bug: Do not override route with / in vertx instrumentation (#8881 - @vandonr)

## IBM Liberty

* :bug: Fix error mark on http status for IBM liberty (#8822 - @amarziali)

## JDBC instrumentation

* :bug: Do not prepend DBM <> APM trace comment in SQLCommenter if there is a pg plan hint (#8864 - @edengorevoy)

## JMS instrumentation

* :sparkles: Add jms as an extra integration name where there is JMS involved (#8933 - @vandonr)

## Kotlin instrumentation

* :sparkles: Enable kotlin_coroutine integration by default (#8848 - @mcculls)
* :broom: Rework Kotlin coroutines instrumentation around coroutine context (#8774 - @mcculls)

## OpenTelemetry instrumentation

* :bug: Support WithSpan inheritContext attribute (#8858 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Add context API support OTel propagators (#8770 - @PerfectSlayer)

## Play Framework instrumentation

* :bug: Fix the Play Framework's span resource name priority so that the client JAX-RS 404 cannot override it (#8591 - @ygree)

## Quarkus Instrumentation

* :bug: Ignore quarkus jaxrs stubs and cdi wrapper proxies (#8891 - @amarziali)

## ServiceTalk
* :sparkles: Improve ServiceTalk Captured Context API Instrumentation for v0.42.56+ (#8821 - @ygree)

## Spring instrumentation

* :sparkles: Supporting Baggage for Instrumentations used in Weblog Tests (#8773 - @mhlidd)

## WebSocket Instrumentation

* :bulb: Trace websocket for spring webflux reactive handlers (#8831 - @amarziali)
* :bulb::test_tube: WebSocket support for Netty (#8632 - @ValentinZakharov)

## Zio Instrumentation

* :broom: Cleanup Zio fiber instrumentation to avoid repeated activation of continuation (#8798 - @mcculls)
